about_the_game:
Check out the Speedrun Challenge of Crash Test Oliver! It's short, action packed and entirely free of charge. AND there are prizes to win!! (More Info In-Game and on our channels)

So don't hesitate, get it now and show us your platformer A-Game!
detailed_description:
Check out the Speedrun Challenge of Crash Test Oliver! It's short, action packed and entirely free of charge. AND there are prizes to win!! (More Info In-Game and on our channels)

So don't hesitate, get it now and show us your platformer A-Game!
name: Oliver Speedrun Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 2,3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 560 GTX 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: You are a Crash Test Dummy. Your goal: pass a test simulation that no other dummy has survived before. Move through a nonlinear world filled with though challenges, dangerous enemies, tricky puzzles and epic bosses. And please don't die like the others, would you?
